content:
Thunderbird is not available for iPads. And I can see where this process has gone wrong and gotten you stuck.

Sorry for the trouble. Please use the process documented at https://www.thunderbird.net/en-US/donate/#faq to request a refund.
creator: wsmwk

content: I should add, there is plenty of ree space on the disk drive.

content: I checked that I have write permissions on the files. Interestingly, the file system says both the Inbox data file and the .msf file were modified this evening, when I have been getting this error.

content:
Answering my own question as follows:

  1. 1 Press "Alt" key
  2. 2 Select "View" in menu bar
  3. 3 Select "Layout" in menu box
  4. 4 Select "Vertical View" in menu box
creator: mrc.6737

content:
Ok - so after 2 mins talking to ChatGPT I have solved the problem.

It started with: Since the wizard is stuck and won't allow manual entry, you can add a POP account manually via the config editor: ⚠️ Advanced users only — but works well. Open Thunderbird Beta Go to Tools > Settings > General > Config Editor (at the bottom)

etc.

But when I went to Settings > General, I saw 'The Account Hub' (EXPERIMENTAL) was there with the tick box selected - - Create accounts in the new Account Hub 

  Experimental new mail account creation flow

So I unticked, and went through to add a new mail account again and this time it flew through with no issues! So Feedback to whoever has developed The Account Hub - IT DOESNT WORK!
creator: ambience.fires

content:
Per poter inquadrare il problema prova a fornire queste informazioni:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)
creator: @next
